details:
noun
- an unpolished unrefined quality
= example: an unpolished unrefined quality
= synonyms: roughness
- an impolite manner that is vulgar and lacking tact or refinement
= example: an impolite manner that is vulgar and lacking tact or refinement
= synonyms: crudity, gaucheness
- a wild or unrefined state
= synonyms: primitivism
